entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 30 km/h late this evening then light overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
